General.Name: Gromutual Bhd
General.Description: Gromutual Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development and management business. The company develops landed residential, commercial buildings, business suites, and industrial parks primarily in Melaka and Johor states, Malaysia. It is also involved in letting of apartments and shop offices; selling oil palm fruits; and provision of property construction and project management services. Gromutual Berhad was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Johor Bahru, Malaysia.
